alert.note: Alert for Finney; Grant (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 11:22PM CDT until July 21 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN KEARNY...SOUTHWESTERN FINNEY...NORTHEASTERN GRANT... NORTHWESTERN GRAY AND NORTHERN HASKELL COUNTIES... At 1122 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Plymell, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Garden City, Holcomb, Deerfield, Pierceville, Charleston and Plymell. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
